title: when will Diana get a new skin?
body: Honestly form i've joined league i played many champs an noticed many champs often gets new skins...i come to like playing diana but notice she mussy had the same two skins from like forever and honestly think she need a new skin, even though i not in charge of that.. but just saying

replies.body:
As AvantelWings mentioned, we're working on the fire-themed skin, which was decided upon by the players! You guys picked the champion in a vote (Teemo, Nautilus or Diana), and Team Fire won the All Star event,  which meant the champion was getting the fire skin.

As a note, it won't be an esports skin, but just a cool fire theme for Diana! 

She's currently in the concept phase, so we're still a bit early on for her. She wasn't intended to come out immediately after All-Star, buuut it's in the works! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=nLnWsXHi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-01T18:46:00.678+0000)
>
> As AvantelWings mentioned, we're working on the fire-themed skin, which was decided upon by the players! You guys picked the champion in a vote (Teemo, Nautilus or Diana), and Team Fire won the All Star event,  which meant the champion was getting the fire skin.
> 
> As a note, it won't be an esports skin, but just a cool fire theme for Diana! 
> 
> She's currently in the concept phase, so we're still a bit early on for her. She wasn't intended to come out immediately after All-Star, buuut it's in the works! ^-^

Since she was announced like 2 months after worlds, would we expect her to be at least 2 months after the world champion skins?
We haven't announced any kind of ETA for her just yet - you'll just need to keep an eye out! :3
Ow kewl thanks for the advise (^_^)  {{item:3068}}  {{champion:131}}  it is :)

I'd like to see All Star Fire Diana skin be either:
1. Solar Fire (a 'what if' of her going the Solari path)
2. Lunar Fire (Fire + Moon)
They are currently working on the Fire skin from All stars for her
